text: 12:3 Daniel 11:33-35; Matyu 13:43; 1 Korin 15:41-42; Jems 5:20Eghtɨ gumazir fofozir aghuiba ko nɨghnɨzir aghuiba itiba, me mɨkoveziba isi moghɨn isi taghtagham. Eghtɨ gumazir gumazamizir avɨrim arazir aghuibar gɨn mangasa men sure gamiba, me zurara mɨkovezibar mɨn isi taghtagh mamaghɨra ikiam.
